algorithm_technique: Group numbers by their sum of digits and track the largest number for each sum.
problem_summary_simple: Find the max sum of two numbers with the same digit sum.
problem_summary_technical: Group numbers by digit sum. For each sum, store the largest number encountered. Update max sum when a new number with the same digit sum is found.
key_insights: The core idea is to group numbers by their sum of digits.
For each digit sum, we only need to store the largest number seen so far to maximize potential pair sums.
When a number with an existing digit sum is encountered, we form a pair with the largest number previously stored for that sum.
